jobs.title: Part-Time Web Designer
jobs.description: Seeking a creative web designer to work on various small projects. Must be skilled in Adobe Creative Suite and have a good eye for design.

jobs.title: Junior Web Developer
jobs.description: Looking for a junior developer to assist with front-end web development tasks. Perfect for students or recent graduates.

jobs.title: Freelance UI/UX Designer
jobs.description: Looking for a freelance UI/UX designer to create user interfaces for client websites. Experience with Figma and wireframing is a must.

jobs.title: Social Media Web Designer
jobs.description: Seeking a designer to create web and graphic assets for social media campaigns. Should be familiar with social media design trends and Adobe Photoshop.

jobs.title: WordPress Developer
jobs.description: Looking for a WordPress developer to manage and customize client websites. Experience with plugins, themes, and PHP is required.
